nodes.text: The Majestic was a starship that served the Galactic Empire during the government's reign. The vessel was commanded by Captain Canonhaus, who strived to learn about the rest of the crew from their files, as taught by Captain Tabor Seitaron at Carida Academy. The other officers learned his signalling mannerisms, which he called his four watches, and he assured that all operations on the Majestic were up to speed at all times.

However, following the destruction of the planet Alderaan in 0 BBY and the failed pursuit of Alderaanian refugees at the space station Fostar Haven, the Majestic was taken from Canonhaus, who was transferred to the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Ultimatum. The captain reflected on his time on the Majestic while aboard the Ultimatum in 3 ABY.
The Majestic was mentioned in the short story "The Final Order," which was written by Seth Dickinson as part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
